Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 3 -- 2.18 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a two and eighteen hundredths (2.18) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $140,610 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of (i) funding a reserve of $50,000 for industrial operations and maintenance and job inducement at the Caldwell Parish Industrial Park and (ii) the remainder of the proceeds of the Tax to be used for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating the 911 emergency telephone system in the Parish, including the acquisition and maintenance of the necessary facilities and equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 3 -- 3.29 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a three and twenty-nine hundredths (3.29) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $212,205 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030, for the purpose of maintaining and operating the Caldwell Parish Courthouse?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 3 -- 7.13 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 3 of 3
(Library Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a special tax of seven and thirteen hundredths (7.13) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $459,885 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of equipping, improving, operating, maintaining and supporting the Caldwell Parish Library?

Race.SpecificTitle: Village of Grayson -- 1% S&U Tax - VC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Village of Grayson of the Parish of Caldwell, State of Louisiana (the "Village"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 29 of the 1974 Louisiana Constitution, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) ("Tax"), with annual Tax collections estimated to be $23,334.33, upon sale at retail, use, lease or rental, consumption and storage for use or consumption of tangible personal property, and sale of services within the Village, for a period of ten (10) years beginning April 1, 2021, with Tax proceeds dedicated to funding maintenance and operation of publicly owned infrastructure improvements and for economic development purposes of the Village?
